title: GET_VEHICLE_COLOR
content:
0xF3CC740D362215480x03BC8F1B// GetVehicleColor
void GET_VEHICLE_COLOR(Vehicle vehicle, int* r, int* g, int* b);Parameters:vehicle: The target vehicler: g: b: See SET_VEHICLE_CUSTOM_PRIMARY_COLOUR and SET_VEHICLE_CUSTOM_SECONDARY_COLOUR.
codeBlocks:
// GetVehicleColor
void GET_VEHICLE_COLOR(Vehicle vehicle, int* r, int* g, int* b);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for GET_VEHICLE_COLOR
GetVehicleColor(vehicle, 0, 0, 0)
